name: The Wolf Hunt
description:
Description:

The wolf hunt: This is a side-scroller, platform, shooter game made for a university project. Enjoy the pretty sprites in this game and challenge your friends to get to the best ending! (hint) it depends on how much sanity you manage to retain.

Back story:

Set after story of little red riding hood. Little red riding hood is traumatized after little red riding hood's encounter with the wolf. One day the wolf pack attacked their village, She escapes through a well and armed herself a crossbow. She decided to take this matter into her own hands and liberate herself from her demons once and for.

Key features :

•Awesome art

•Unlimited Ammo so shoot to your heart's content

•Strong female protagonist with personality

•2 types of jumps (have fun working it out)

•Very Challenging
